properties.author: Kjetil Klepper
properties.description: A simple motif scanning program that searches for matches to IUPAC consensus motifs in sequences. The total match score is the sum of match scores for each base, where a match to a specific base gives 1.0 points, a match to a double-degenerate symbol (Y,R,K,M,S,W) gives a score of 0.5 and a match to a triple-degenerate symbol (B,D,H,V) gives a score of 1/3.
